The Centers for Disease Control and Prev: CDC) states that while vitamin C supplements can reduce the risk of catching a cold and shorten its duration, they have no significant impact on the length of a cold once it has started.
The assertion made by Andrew Saul: also known as "The Megavitamin Man," that high doses of vitamin C can dramatically slow or stop the coronavirus pandemic is not backed by any evidence.
